\pard\cf1\f0\fs24\lang1033 ### Turkey.Explanations\par
\par
(learn the difference between "\f1\lang1055 yer\f0\lang1033 sin"\f1\lang1055  and \f0\lang1033 "\f1\lang1055 yiyor\f0\lang1033 sun")\par
{\cf0{\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK https://lingust.ru/t%C3%BCrk%C3%A7e/t%C3%BCrk%C3%A7e-dersleri/ders11 }}{\fldrslt{https://lingust.ru/t%C3%BCrk%C3%A7e/t%C3%BCrk%C3%A7e-dersleri/ders11\ul0\cf0}}}}\f0\fs24\par
sdfgdfg\f2\lang1049\par
\'c8\'e7\'f3\'f7\'e8\'f2\'fc \'f5\'ee\'f0\'ee\'f8\'ee \'e2\'e8\'ed\'e8\'f2\'e5\'eb\'fc\'ed\'fb\'e9 \'ef\'e0\'e4\'e5\'e6 \'e2 \'f2\'f3\'f0\'e5\'f6\'ea\'ee\'ec. \'ca\'e0\'ea \'fd\'f2\'ee \'ec\'ee\'e4\'e5\'f2 \'e8\'f1\'ef\'ee\'eb\'fc\'e7\'ee\'e2\'e0\'f2\'fc\'f1\'ff \'f1 "\'cd\'e0\'f1\'f2\'ee\'ff\'f9\'e5\'e5-\'e1\'f3\'e4\'f3\'f9\'e5\'e5 \'e2\'f0\'e5\'ec\'ff (-r,-\f3\u305?r, -ar)\f2 "\par
\f1\lang1055\par
\f2\lang1049 "\f3\'aaekeri ben yerim."\par
if you have an accusative object, you can place the subject after it to emphasize that it was THIS PERSON who made the action.\f1\lang1055  \f3\lang1049 For example, if somebody asks "Who ate the sugar?" it would be very awkward to say "Ben \'baekeri yedim" or "\'baekeri yedim." You should say "\'aaekeri ben yedim."\par
\f2\par
}
TxtContent:
### Turkey.Explanations

(learn the difference between "yersin" and "yiyorsun")
https://lingust.ru/t%C3%BCrk%C3%A7e/t%C3%BCrk%C3%A7e-dersleri/ders11
sdfgdfg
Изучить хорошо винительный падеж в турецком. Как это модет использоваться с "Настоящее-будущее время (-r,-ır, -ar)"

"Şekeri ben yerim."
if you have an accusative object, you can place the subject after it to emphasize that it was THIS PERSON who made the action. For example, if somebody asks "Who ate the sugar?" it would be very awkward to say "Ben şekeri yedim" or "şekeri yedim." You should say "Şekeri ben yedim."
